title: Ticket #7526: Shadow wrongly does not recogize or log JOB_NOT_STARTED.
description:
In BaseShadow::logEvictEvent(), we check for JOB_CKPTED, JOB_NOT_CKPTED, and JOB_KILLED; if the evict reason isn't one of those, we don't log it, claiming the reason is unknown. This log message -- and absence of a log entry -- can regularly occur if the schedd starts a job's shadow before the previous occupant of that slot has finished evicting, because the eviction reason in that case is JOB_NOT_STARTED.

Until we rearchitect the startd, this race condition is unavoidable; but since we explicitly check for it, we probably should print a scary message to the log and not tell the user what happened.
creator: tlmiller
